ValidationRule.description: "Assigned To" can not be blank if the case is going into a Closed status type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Assigned_To__c), RecordType.Name <> "PGi-SFDC Support", !$User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = TRUE, $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed - Not Needed'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed - Rejected'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Complete') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Assigned To field must be populated for any case going into a Closed status.
